items.title: Mayors from 'sanctuary cities' testify before Congress
items.description: The Mayors of Boston, Chicago, Denver and New York City are testifying in front of the House Oversight Committee during a blockbuster hearing on sanct...

items.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: Ukraine officials say US has paused intelligence sharing
items.description: Ukrainian officials have confirmed the U.S. has partially suspended intelligence support to the country.

items.title: Supreme Court rules Trump administration must unfreeze foreign aid payments
items.description: A divided Supreme Court ruled that the Trump administration must pay out nearly $2 billion in foreign assistance funds to nonprofit aid groups.

items.title: 'A hot mess': Federal office that resolves surprise medical bills slashed by Trump
items.description: Ending surprise medical bills used to be a Trump priority, but he just slashed the federal office working on that.

items.title: Trump, Musk raise questions, without evidence, about whether gold at Fort Knox stolen
items.description: Trump suggested he and Elon Musk would go there to check it out firsthand.
